metadata.title: CVE-2021-44879 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
In gc_data_segment in fs/f2fs/gc.c in the Linux kernel before 5.16.3,special files are not considered, leading to a move_data_page NULL pointerdereference.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44879` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-22-generic - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-5.15.0-22-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-generic - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-generic-64k - 5.15.0-22.22
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-kvm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-aws - 5.15.0-1002.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1001-azure - 5.15.0-1001.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1001-gcp - 5.15.0-1001.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-gke - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-ibm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1001-oracle - 5.15.0-1001.3
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-1003-raspi - 5.15.0-1003.3
linux-image-5.15.0-1003-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1003.3
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-lowlatency - 5.15.0-22.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-22-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-22.22
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.17.0-1003-oem - 5.17.0-1003.3
No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.0.0-1006-oem - 6.0.0-1006.6
No subscription required
